actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
actions.subcommittee: Information Policy, Census, and National Archives
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Information Policy, Census, and National Archives.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Information Policy, Census, and National Archives

official_title: To require that, in the questionnaires used in the taking of any decennial census of population, a checkbox or other similar option be included so that respondents may indicate Caribbean extraction or descent.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Commerce to include in any questionnaire used in a decennial census to determine state populations an option for respondents to indicate Caribbean extraction or descent.

titles.title: To require that, in the questionnaires used in the taking of any decennial census of population, a checkbox or other similar option be included so that respondents may indicate Caribbean extraction or descent.
